item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.content:encoded:
@Anon,

Good tip on the recommended AH reading.

Og’s Ledger

mmo Auctioneer

So many WoW guides are faux guides with no real information, or they’re just a front for advertising and gold sites. Always enjoy new reading recommendations.

item.title: By: anon
item.dc:creator: anon
item.description: Note: I didn't farm at all and spent an average of 4 hours a week playing the AH.
item.content:encoded: Note: I didn’t farm at all and spent an average of 4 hours a week playing the AH.

item.title: By: anon
item.dc:creator: anon
item.description:
It's very easy to make gold. Just play the AH.
See mmo-auctioneer.com and Og's Ledger for walkthroughs on how to do this.
I've personally made 17.5k gold since October, starting from 0g.
item.content:encoded:
It’s very easy to make gold. Just play the AH.

See mmo-auctioneer.com and Og’s Ledger for walkthroughs on how to do this.

I’ve personally made 17.5k gold since October, starting from 0g.

item.content:encoded:
Of course, you could always whore yourself out like that one skeez on craigslist.

*shudder*

item.title: By: Pete
item.dc:creator: Pete
item.description:
Hmm. What would people think to a "casual" epic flying mount that lasted X (60?) minutes, during which time you could mount/dismount as much as you wanted, but was on a 24h cooldown?
Make it available at a lower cost (heck, quest reward even - preferably not requiring a dungeon) and possibly make it ugly (certainly not using existing epic mount skins, that will cause the same QQ as using the same models for PVP and dungeon armour) - would people complain or be glad?
item.content:encoded:
Hmm. What would people think to a “casual” epic flying mount that lasted X (60?) minutes, during which time you could mount/dismount as much as you wanted, but was on a 24h cooldown?

Make it available at a lower cost (heck, quest reward even – preferably not requiring a dungeon) and possibly make it ugly (certainly not using existing epic mount skins, that will cause the same QQ as using the same models for PVP and dungeon armour) – would people complain or be glad?

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description:
the problem is that ppl who raid a lot end up farming to afford consumables and respecs with very little left over for a mount fund. it's kind of like wow is split into fighting classes and merchant/farmer classes. the former being poor folks on slow mounts in really nice gear, and the latter being rich folks on fast mounts and the nicest gear money can buy.
the ppl who have the best of both worlds spend a hell of a lot of time living inside the video game. =P
item.content:encoded:
the problem is that ppl who raid a lot end up farming to afford consumables and respecs with very little left over for a mount fund. it’s kind of like wow is split into fighting classes and merchant/farmer classes. the former being poor folks on slow mounts in really nice gear, and the latter being rich folks on fast mounts and the nicest gear money can buy.

the ppl who have the best of both worlds spend a hell of a lot of time living inside the video game. =P

item.title: By: Sully
item.dc:creator: Sully
item.description:
In response to MH:
I might argue that players who are only on a few hours a week are the ones who benefit the most from fast flying mounts. Why waste half your playing time in flight? ;)
item.content:encoded:
In response to MH:

I might argue that players who are only on a few hours a week are the ones who benefit the most from fast flying mounts. Why waste half your playing time in flight? ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Fords
item.dc:creator: Fords
item.description: Personally I think life's too short to constantly grind (which I hate doing anyway) for the mount, no matter how fast and shiny the dragons are /envy. I always end up spending my money on something I need far more anyway :)
item.content:encoded: Personally I think life’s too short to constantly grind (which I hate doing anyway) for the mount, no matter how fast and shiny the dragons are /envy. I always end up spending my money on something I need far more anyway ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Papa
item.dc:creator: Papa
item.description: Tried herbing in outland on a slow mount? Waste of time.
item.content:encoded: Tried herbing in outland on a slow mount? Waste of time.

item.title: By: Zaphid
item.dc:creator: Zaphid
item.description: And don't forget that in WOtLK, you will have another 8-10 leve.s where you DON'T need your flying mount, thus more time to make money for it.
item.content:encoded: And don’t forget that in WOtLK, you will have another 8-10 leve.s where you DON’T need your flying mount, thus more time to make money for it.
